name: Crazy Avalanche
description:
A terrible but predictable disaster occurred.

Mighty Winds formed around the World.

The Mighty Winds picked up and thrown all manner of objects into the air.

It caused everything one can think of to plummet dangerously toward the Land.

At least one has found a way to stay safe.

For now...

Crazy Avalanche is a niche title that deserves to be played! It has an old school feel to its difficulty. The player must protect the nervous Victim for as long as possible by destroying the random objects that are frequently falling. The panicky Victim fortunately thought ahead and made use of the various Bunkers provided throughout the World of Lands. The Bunkers ensure great protection, but if they're destroyed - Watch Out!

Help the tense Victim stay sane and unharmed through several concentrated levels amongst various Lands!

Enjoy Retro SFX and Bumping Music! Headphones are highly recommended!

See if you can think of the relevance of some of the random objects that appear!

Can you keep up the pace? Keep the worried Victim safe by eliminating the random dangers dropping his way! A mouse is highly recommended!

Enjoy the start of a unique line of titles from a single Independent Developer!
